thread.title: Flight Returns to Honolulu Due to 'Mechanical Issue'
thread.title_full: Flight Returns to Honolulu Due to 'Mechanical Issue'

author: senh
title: Flight Returns to Honolulu Due to 'Mechanical Issue'
text: BING NEWS: United Airlines Flight Returns to Honolulu Due to 'Mechanical Issue' A United Airlines plane from Honolulu to Washington, D.C., returned to Hawaii shortly after takeoff Saturday night after a "mechanical issue," the airline said. A passenger on the Boeing 767 posted on Twitter that the plane turned around an hour and a half ... 10/18/2015 - 4:12 am | View Link Qantas flight from Dubai makes unplanned landing; lands 15 hours behind schedule DUBAI // A flight from Dubai to Sydney had to make an unplanned stop in Perth because of a mechanical problem.Australian media ... ground at Dubai International Airport.The flight, which was due to land in Sydney at 5.10am local time, made its unscheduled ... 08/30/2015 - 1:00 pm | View Link Hawaiian Airlines flight returns to Los Angeles for emergency landing A Hawaiian Airlines flight from Los Angeles to Honolulu returned to Los Angeles International Airport on Monday afternoon after experiencing mechanical problems ... when the flight crew declared an emergency due to fumes in the cabin. 05/18/2015 - 12:35 pm | View Link Delta flight diverts, lands in Hilo with 1 engine A Delta Air Lines flight from Los Angeles to Honolulu with 234 people aboard had divert to Hawaii's Big Island because of a mechanical issue. The airline says in a statement that Flight 1559 encountered a mechanical issue Thursday with one of the plane's ... 02/13/2015 - 11:22 am | View Link American Airlines Flight from DFW to Hawaii Diverted American Airlines says a flight Friday from Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport to Honolulu was ... Earlier Friday, an American Airlines flight from DFW to Palm Springs was redirected back to DFW also due to a possible mechanical issue.
